name: Countess' Escape- Visual Novel
description:
Will you let the Countess escape or will you let her get captured? 

Play as the fortune teller that will unveil the truth upon why the Countess is hiding from the Prince and what fate would the characters have due to your own choices. Their future relies on your hands.


This game has two different endings depending on your choice. The flow of events can also change depending on your choices. Who will you end up with? (Playtime of this Visual Novel or Interactive Story would be ~30 minutes.)

(Story+Art+Soundtrack+Code by Yaryankune)
